approximately 11 cm tall when made as directed © akabekobotan 2022 body tooth use white yarn foundation 6 st magic_ring round 1 double_crochet in each st 6 st round 2 *1dc 2dc in 1 st* repeat ** to end of round 9 st round 3 double_crochet to end of round 9 st round 4 *2dc 2dc in 1 st* repeat ** to end of round 12 st round 5 double_crochet to end of round 12 st round 6 *3dc 2dc in 1 st* repeat ** to end of round 15 st round 7 double_crochet to end of round 15 st round 8 *4dc 2dc in 1 st* repeat ** to end of round 18 st slip_stitch invisible fasten_off leaving a long tail make a total of 3 pieces in the same way make a fourth piece up to the end of round 8 but do not break the yarn assemble the four pieces as shown below note that each piece will have 12 stitches left over after assembly which you will continue to crochet into 1 align two pieces as shown and sew three pairs of loops together as indicated by the pins 2 add the third piece and sew the three pairs of loops together as shown © akabekobotan 2022 3 add the last piece with the live stitches 4 ensure that the live stitch on the last and sew the pieces together as previously piece is next to the first stitch
